attributes.action: Phase out the licence fee and make BBC become self funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir,

The BBC seems to be involved in more and more controvesy by the day over its decisions and alleged political and non policital bias. This controvesy will continue for as long as the BBC is funded by the Licencee fee payers. 

I and the undersigned respectfully petition you to review the existing law and allow people the freedom and choice in deciding whether or not they should pay for the BBC , just like they would for sky, thereby bringing the BBC in line with the rest of the free market channels.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
